name: OSAction
desc: An object that executes your driver's custom behavior.

items.name: + Create
items.desc: Creates a new action object and configures it with your custom target object and callback method.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Performs any final cleanup for the action object.

items.name: - SetAbortedHandler
items.desc: Install a handler for the system to call when no other processes reference the action object.

items.name: - GetReference
items.desc: Returns a pointer to any additional memory allocated by the action object on your behalf.

items.name: - Cancel
items.desc: Cancels the execution of the action's callbacks.

items.name: - Aborted
items.desc: Calls the abort handler of the action object.
